programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Tortour 2017 (SUI) & Mountain Festival (ESP)
programme.desc: The incredible landscapes of the Parc National D'Aigüestortes i Estany de Sant Maurici as well as the magical settings of La Vall de Boí have been the chosen venue for the celebration, of the first edition of BUFF® MOUNTAIN VALL DE BOI FESTIVAL.

programme.title: Transmaurienne Vanoise - MTB Stage Race (FRA)
programme.desc: The world's biggest cycling area hosts one of the most beautiful mountain bike races in the world, and of course it's right here in the French Alps, in the Haute Maurienne/Vanoise region. It is the incredible Transmaurienne 2017!

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon - Cycle Marathon - Sölden (AUT)
programme.desc: 4 steep Alpine passes, 238 kilometres in distance, and 5,500 metres in altitude: on August 27, 2017, nearly 5,000 competitors from all over the world will tackle the Oetztaler Radmarathon at Soelden, Tirol, Austria.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 3
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship KZ / KZ2
programme.desc: The last FIA Karting event of the season will take place in Portugal. The Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Championship - KZ will see the discipline’s top drivers battle it out alongside participants in the FIA Karting World Cup - KZ2 and the Int. Masters Super Cup.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf World Tour Brazilian Special
programme.desc: The GKA Kitesurf World Tour 2024 will feature three spectacular stops in Brazil, highlighting the nation’s premier kitesurfing destinations. With top riders battling for championship titles, the 2024 season is set to deliver unforgettable action for fans worldwide.

programme.title: Skoda Titan Desert Series - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: In today´s episode the Titan Desert 2024 in NEOM, Saudi Arabia, challenges mountain bikers with intense desert terrains, combining endurance, competition, and stunning landscapes in a unique event showcasing one of the world’s most innovative regions.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: The Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2024 promises to be an adrenaline-packed showcase of the world’s top freeride skiers and snowboarders, set against the stunning backdrop of Nendaz’s pristine alpine terrain.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Episode 24
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 24

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: Mbuzi Dume - Strong Goat - Kilimandscharo (TZN)
programme.desc: Tom Belz was faced with the challenge of his life: The 31-year-old goes through life with one leg and two crutches and then climbs the highest mountain in Africa. He also wants to encourage others with his own story.

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - 52min HL (Sailing, Mitte Februar) – International + DACH
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe wants to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean protection during the circumnavigation. By sailing around the world, the Vendée Globe sailors are drawing attention to the fragility of our oceans.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2

programme.title: Episode 24
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 24

programme.title: Actionclip OERM22 AUT Traum Kurzfilm
programme.desc: Actionclip OERM22 AUT Traum Kurzfilm

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 3
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: WOF 2025 #01: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports 2025 and to the thrilling finale of the BrinxWorld Downhill Skateboarding Championship2024 from the breathtaking slopes of Roan Mountain, USA, where speed meets skill and gravity takes no prisoners.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #02: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: Today we look back at the 2024 Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup – a season of breathtaking tricks, fierce competition, and unforgettable moments. Join us as we relive the highlights, celebrate the champions, and wrap up an incredible year on the water!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #03: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow
programme.desc: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow / Europe: A look back at the skate highlights of the 2023 World Rookie Tour. Then we show the best of the 2024 ski and snowboard action. And finally, we let it rip once again - with the 2024 Skate Finals!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski & Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: Acro Games - Paragliding Aerobatics - Organya (ESP) & Rock Master Festival - Bouldering - Arco (ITA)
programme.desc: Organya is a very special place for this kind of flying and enables the pilots to basically do these tricks. They climb up and go down and that´s why it is called the magic mountain.

programme.title: Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett - Fribourg (SUI) & World Paragliding Championships - Monte Avena (ITA)
programme.desc: 61st Gordon Bennett Cup & FAI 15th Paragliding World Championship

programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Inside Surfing Ep.1
programme.desc: Inside Surfing tells the stories about the people, places and things that make surfing so special. Is it a sport, an art form or a lifestyle, or all three at the same time? The series provides a look behind the scenes of surfing with all its facets.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #05: 10 Years LAAX OPEN Documentary
programme.desc: The Laax Open has been a meeting place for winter sports fans for years. See the best riders, breathtaking performances and unforgettable moments that have shaped the history of freestyle culture.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #06: Queen & King of the Court Finals 2024
programme.desc: The stage is set for the 2024 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series Finals in Qatar! The best beach volleyball players will compete against each other in the Aspire Zone. From December 12-14, the best athletes in the world will battle it out for the title.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #07: Motosurf World Championship Finals
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and to the Motosurf World Championship Finals from Macao, China, where the world’s top motosurfers battle for glory against a breathtaking backdrop of speed and precision. Who will conquer and claim the ultimate title?

programme.title: WOF 2025 #08: International Marathon Gorges de l’Ardèche
programme.desc: The Marathon International des Gorges de l'Ardèche is an annual canoe and kayak race in France. Participants navigate a 27-kilometre course through the breathtaking Ardèche Gorge.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 3
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf World Tour & GWA Wingfoil World Tour Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to the breathtaking shores of Dakhla, Morocco - where the desert meets the sea. We´ll take you on a jounrey as athletes harness the power of the wind, riding the waves and soaring through the skies in one of the world´s most stunning watersport destinations.

programme.title: Transcordilleras
programme.desc: Transcordilleras is a 1,000-kilometer self-supported bikepacking race across the Andes in Colombia. This year, the organizers offered three-stage, eight-stage, and non-stop versions of the event.

programme.title: Inside Surfing Ep.5
programme.desc: Inside Surfing tells the stories about the people, places and things that make surfing so special. Is it a sport, an art form or a lifestyle, or all three at the same time? The series provides a look behind the scenes of surfing with all its facets.

programme.title: Inside Surfing Ep.6
programme.desc: Inside Surfing tells the stories about the people, places and things that make surfing so special. Is it a sport, an art form or a lifestyle, or all three at the same time? The series provides a look behind the scenes of surfing with all its facets.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Episode 24

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2016 - The Heroes
programme.desc: Every year since 2008, the world's best freeride skiers and snowboarders have competed for the world championship title in the Freeride World Tour. Thanks to the top sporting performances, the tour has become an integral part of the international winter sports calendar.

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Iceland Traverse - Mountain Bike Expedition - Iceland
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to go through Iceland by mountain bike. Unlike touring bikers, they want to explore the best single trails. They developed a plan to conquer the deep rivers, snow fields and sandy sections along the way.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintélyon
programme.desc: The Asics SaintéLyon is a legendary nocturnal ultramarathon in France that takes place on the route from Saint-Étienne to Lyon. The 2025 edition is scheduled for November 29 and 30 and promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #11: Epic Series – Season Preview
programme.desc: Today we take you on an exciting journey. Get ready for an exclusive preview of the Absa Cape Epic and the Epic Series 2025 - the ultimate test of endurance, skill and teamwork.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #12: Mediterranean Epic by Scott 2025
programme.desc: February 6-9, 2025, Oropesa del Mar (ESP): The Mediterranean Epic is a UCI 4-stage race where mountain bikers can enjoy mountain biking to the fullest on the course around Oropesa del Mar in the province of Castellón in Spain.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Jeremie Heitz

programme.desc: From September 09th to 17 the best aerobatic pilots come together in South Africa for the FAI World Aerobatic Championships.

programme.title: adidas Sickline 2017 - Ötztal/AUT
programme.desc: Austria’s legendary “Wellerbrücke“ rapids are the setting for the Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championships. From October 5 to 7, 2017, the world’s best female and male whitewater kayakers meet at the big anniversary event at Ötztal Valley.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 1
programme.desc: Nestled in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together the world’s top backcountry athletes, showcasing their incredible skills and creativity.

programme.title: Transcordilleras
programme.desc: Transcordilleras is a 1,000-kilometer self-supported bikepacking race across the Andes in Colombia. This year, the organizers offered three-stage, eight-stage, and non-stop versions of the event.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #13: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together some of the world's best backcountry athletes to showcase their skills.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #14: Pierra Menta 2025
programme.desc: The Pierra Menta is one of the toughest and most prestigious ski mountaineering races in the world. Held in the French Alps, it challenges teams of two over four days with steep ascents, technical descents, and over 10,000 meters of elevation gain.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #15: Come Hell or High Water - Tibet extreme kayaking adventure
programme.desc: This week we are heading to the tibetian Hymalayans. Under the famous peaks and ridges, down in the deep valleya, lays the playground of some extreme sportsmen.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #16: GKA & GWA Season Start
programme.desc: Today we will have a look at the best Kitsurf and Wingfoil Women od the World, as they kicked off the 2025 season on the capverdian Islands.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 2
programme.desc: Nestled in the heart of the Swiss Alps, the Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 is one of the most exciting events on the freeride calendar. This unique competition brings together the world’s top backcountry athletes, showcasing their incredible skills and creativity.

programme.title: LAAX Freestyle - Snowboard Halfpipe Special
programme.desc: The LAAX Open brings together the best professionals in the world with the next generation of riders - all competing in the same event. First-class snowboard competitions, powder runs, lifestyle, cultural and culinary delights - there is something for every taste.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Swatch Catch The Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Episode 24
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 24

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights
programme.desc: GKA Kitesurf Worldtour Sylt Highlights - Sylt (GER)Welcome to World of Freesports and the beautiful beaches of Sylt, the most northern part of Germany, where the Big Air Riders of the GKA are off for a battle. Let´s check out this spectaculare water event!

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: Gorges de l'Ardèche
programme.desc: France is home to several geological and aquatic wonders. In autumn, the river and its gorges are the perfect setting for a competition celebrating white-water paddling. It’s the 37th edition of the International Marathon!

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary

programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jürjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E212 Undercover Love S1 E212
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E212 Dholi Beats S1 E212
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E212 King of Hearts S1 E212
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E212 Second Chances S1 E212
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Jodha Akbar S3 E6
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Jodha Akbar S3 E8
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Przyjacielu, Spoczywaj w Pokoju!

programme.title: Na samotnej drodze
programme.desc: Weteran Johnny Rush wraca do domu, by odkryć, że jego ranczo zostało skonfiskowane przez barona bydła. Dowiaduje się, że jego dziewczyna jest zaręczona z baronem, aby ratować finansowo zagrożone ranczo jej ojca. Po utracie ręki w walce z poplecznikami barona, Rush zaczyna używać łuku, by pomścić swoje straty.

programme.title: Wspaniały Teksan
programme.desc: Glenn Saxon, Barbara Loy, Massimo Serato, Gloria Osuna.El Desperado (Glenn Saxon) jest twardym, sprawnie władającym rewolwerem właścicielem saloonu, który pomaga meksykańskim chłopom przeciwstawić się okrutnie uciskającemu ich latyfundyście.

programme.title: Znajdź Miejsce W Którym Możesz Umrzeć
programme.desc: Wyrzutek, żołnierz Konfederacji, odkupuje swoje winy broniąc kobiety przed bandytami, którzy są gotowi ją zabić dla kopalni złota.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Ścigany
programme.desc: W małym miasteczku miejscowy szeryf zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i zmuszony do ucieczki.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Noc Węża
programme.desc: Hernández, dowódca garnizonu w małej wiosce, dołącza do grupy mieszczan, którzy chcą ograbić młodego chłopca - Manuela - ze spadku.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros

programme.title: Strzelaj Joe, Strzelaj!

programme.title: Wszyscy Bracia z Zachodu Wspierają Swojego Ojca

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców

programme.title: Dni Nienawiści
